PersonalStatement.text: David Fitzgerald, born on 1966-08-24, is a Male based in Melissachester, Ukraine. He is Divorced and holds British nationality. Currently working at Fields-Pham.

WorkExperience.text: HR Manager at Cohen, Patrick and Ortega from 2011 to 2016.
Senior Research Scientist at Fields-Pham, 2019 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Master's in Business Administration from China University of Geosciences
Master's in Engineering from Universidade Federal de Goiás

PersonalSkills.text: Technical Proficiency: Expert in cloud computing and distributed systems.
Communication: Strong ability to present technical information to non-technical stakeholders.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys running marathons.
